item.title: Biden commutes sentences for 1,500, pardons 39 convicted of non-violent crimes
item.description: The White House hinted that this isn't the last of Biden's pardons during his final months in office.

item.title: WATCH: Baby sees clearly for the first time

item.title: Trump names Kari Lake director of Voice of America, gives his donors ambassadorships
item.description: The president-elect also said he'd soon announce the head of the U.S. Agency for Global Media.
